brief.content-text: The diagram depicts a WAN, consisting of four schools and a School District Main Office. All of the POPs of the schools and the Main Office are connected by a T1 link to the central WAN link. The Main Office is connected to a PSTN and the Internet via T 1 link. All of the schools connect to the Internet via the Main Office. Traffic from the Main Office to the Internet travels through a T 3 link.
